BRUH, Inc. is its second year as a 501c(3) non-profit organization. IT was formed by area educators and youth developers in order to assist minority children achieve in subsequent life.
Programs:
-Overachievers Enrichment Program Adolesent males take part in a 6 month enrichment program including , campus tours, and pro and college sporting events.
Service in Return A volunteer program that links college students with area after school programs.
MLK Leadership Basketball Camp Now in its third year, MLK Camp allows young males to learn fundamentals of the game of basketbal along with various aspects of leadership. Helgd on MLK day.
